page.title: 04Local events
page.content: Stones have been thrown on the roof of the shelter in the{recreation ground, and the walls have been written on. The see_saw is broken and there is litter around the shelter. The Town Council are considering building a practice wall in the recreation area for tennis, football and other general sports use. There is to be an experimental{bus service on Friday and Saturday evenings. It starts (31st. May) from Exeter, Broadclyst,{Bradninch,}to Cullompton. It might be stopped if full use is not made of it. The Town Council have written to the District Town Council in{Tiverton to ask them to consider making a car park on the waste ground between Culver Close and Fore Street. {British Rail}plan to change the manned level crossing to automatic.
